description.text1: I am a Front-end developer based in Munich, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
description.text2: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

mywork.headline: My Projects
mywork.introduction: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

contact.header2: Is there a problem to solve?
contact.contactText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.contactLinkText: Are You looking for a frontend developer?

form.name: Your name
form.privacyError: please agree to the privacy policy
form.privacyAfter: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
